div.div:
Based on session state
remove or re-create ACL entry

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 215px; margin-left: 530px;

div.div:
ACL counter is not removed from the HW.
FC thread still polls the counter.

switch.text: ACL counter is not removed from the HW....
